website_summaries.verdict: A fun-filled kit that's sure to delight young L.O.L Surprise fans with loads of beads, a wide variety of charms, and stickers to create jewelry with secret messages for friends to decode.
pros: An impressive variety of pieces encourages kids to get creative
Comes with easy-to-follow tips and tricks for creating different types of necklaces and bracelets
Secret message stickers and a decoder let kids create special pieces of jewelry for friends and family
cons: Could do with sturdier packaging for keeping things organized

customer_reviews.title: Very Difficult to work with
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter's 6th birthday. The beads are almost impossible to thread. You will need some sharp instrument to push the cord through and a pair of tweezers to grab with. The thread and the stretchy bands fray making it even more difficult to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Alyce

customer_reviews.title: Potentially cute and fun activity for a girl
customer_reviews.text: Super cute gift idea for a girl turning 7. Only hiccup is it is missing one of the three elastic bands. See pictures attached. There’s a chance maybe it’s hiding somewhere else in the package but I can’t see without opening it and there’s no point in me doing that since this is meant as a present for someone. A new one is on the way so hopefully all the pieces will be there.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: LOL Suprise set is perfect gift for ages 5+ | Calamari Curls
customer_reviews.text: This NEW! LOL Suprise set is perfect gift for ages 5+ I was able to decode secret messages to put on bracelets I made for my best friends. There were so many options to choose from. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is so awesome. I have two girls 4 and 8
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome. I have two girls 4 and 8, it allows them to create things, spell out works, a delight! Plus, they LOVE LOL!!! Perfect practical gift for the LOL fan. My kids are addicted to LOL and the videos too!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Chang

customer_reviews.title: Love lol’s? More to love!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is 7 loves this jewelry making. If your child likes lol’s, she will enjoy this kit. It’s easy, fun and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Fishbein Siller

customer_reviews.title: Super cute set
customer_reviews.text: Super cute set, the material are good just as I expected. My nice like to play with it and it occupied her time for quite some time more than the little dolls. Great addition to the LOL collection
customer_reviews.author: Rizky Darpi

customer_reviews.title: I recommend getting a container for the beads!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute product for making bracelets. It has sooooo many beads! Not even 10 minutes after she opened it for her birthday were there beads everywhere and I was sweeping them up and just throwing them away. I need to get her a multiple compartment container with a snap lid because there is no way to keep them from pouring out of the package they come in once it's opened. Especially with clumsy kiddos. I would recommend if you buy this, to have such a container already! It's a great product for creativity and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Stone

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute gift. I bought for my 4 year old. Way to advanced for her but I helped her with it and she had fun. Lots of little cute options.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, has anyone ever looked up the dude who started this company? OMG, basically turned nothing into a freaking ton of money...lol. Anyway, all the girls in our family love this stuff. I personally think it's overpriced junk. However, I didn't mind buying this for one of them because she was able to make LOL jewelry with her best friend. Sometimes memories are worth than a few extra bucks. Typically, I don't buy this stuff. The product itself was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Deloris P.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I chose this set because my daughter loves LOL. Be careful when opening because the beads may go flying everywhere if you don’t open slowly and carefully. Other than that the product was great and she loved that there were multiple necklaces and bracelets to make. I had to help her a little to make them but it helped to teach her to be creative and design the items on her own. Great value for the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Perfect Gift for a Little Girl
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the cutest jewelry making kit ever for a little girl! I bought this for my four year old granddaughter for her birthday. The look on her face was priceless when she opened it. My daughter will be helping her with her jewelry making projects. There's a wonderful variety of beads for her to work with. Very, very nice package and great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah&Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sent an old/opened item
customer_reviews.text: This supposedly new item was a gift and I sent it straight to the parent of the birthday girl. And now it's the night before her birthday and come to find out it was open and doesn't look new. I'm very disappointed by hearing that. The parent taped it up, but she shouldn't have had to do that. I did not order a used item so it should have came new, but now it's too late to send it back because it's in another state and my niece birthday is tomorrow. I'm not a happy camper right now.
customer_reviews.author: Tamekia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift - lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these to give as virtual bday party favors for my daughters 9 year old bday. We dropped them off at each child’s house and then the girls made bracelets together online - perfect activity for a virtual bday party! The girls were all happy and you can make a lot of jewelry from this one kit.
customer_reviews.author: KLZ

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece’s birthday and she absolutely loves it! The bead colors in this kit are beautiful and fun! This is a great gift for girls that love self-expression and sharing secret messages with their friends!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do with my four year old granddaughter and the beads were not able to slide on all the cording easily. The finer cord was ok, but the satin cord was event difficult for me to get the beads onto it. There were no clasp, both the necklace and the bracelets needed to be tied.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Lacking Letters
customer_reviews.text: There are tons of beads, but not enough letter beads or stickers to spell much. We couldn't even put together a "BFF" without using the different sized slider beads. When your child is excited about spelling things it can be frustrating when you can't make it happen!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and fun kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fun craft for my 6 year old. She absolutely loves it. It comes with a ton of beads and some of them are customizable with the LOL symbols. Each jewelry design comes with easy to follow instructions but little hands will probably need a little help. Really entertaining and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: cute bday gift
customer_reviews.text: not sure why but kids love the the LOL dolls. I bought this for a kiddo's 7th bday and she said she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: SLawhon

customer_reviews.title: Girls love it but your budget not that much
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my niece and she loves it! L.O.L is always a good brand for girls, she was happy with the gift, me not that much, I think the brand is expensive for what actually comes in the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anny cancino

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative gift for an lol fan
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift for a 7 year old LOL fan and I thought it’s a great alternative to the ugly dolls😂 plus it will develop creativity so I think it will be a hit for a birthday girl. We did purchase the surprise doll too though to go with this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: Too many small pieces
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 5 year old could not do this without help and the holes on the beads are too small. We ended up throwing it away after making 2 string necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: Elenda Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble for MY 5 yr. old
customer_reviews.text: With this kit, I included a box with compartments to organize the beads. Threading beads was a little tedious for my 5 yr. old grand daughter. Bracelet broke soon after she wore it just a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Samiam

customer_reviews.title: Beads don't fit in string
customer_reviews.text: The strings and yarn that are provided are too thick for most of the beads provided. It does not work and was a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: S. Madhavan

customer_reviews.title: Beads fly everywhere unless you open very carefully!
customer_reviews.text: Beware!! The packaging on this is such that if you open it normal the beads fly everywhere. It is best to extremely slowly and carefully open this package and then transfer the supplies to another type of container. Keeps my almost 5 year old busy and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Moreau

customer_reviews.title: LOL Surprise
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved making the jewelry! Would recommend this for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Paschall Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Cute LOL Craft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it is absolutely adored. You can make multiple items and even get or use your own string to make things. Would recommend this to anyone who enjoys crafts!
customer_reviews.author: Rosé

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for a 6yr old. Especially since shes just at home due to the pandemic. Its small & cute!
customer_reviews.author: juliea

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great items in it but I wish you could reuse the box to keep everything organized. Ounce you have box open hard to reuse it :(
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun and colorful assortment
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of beads and strings. Fun colors and designs. My 8 year old daughter loves this activity and we have lots of friendship bracelets now thanks to this fun bracelet making set.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Bead holes are too small
customer_reviews.text: String doesn't fit in most beads. Hole in a lot of the beads is way too small. Makes it impossible to thread.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived open
customer_reviews.text: While packaged nice and secure in an Amazon box, the actual toy packaging was open and looked used. Not cool. For the cost, it wasn't worth my time to return. I just went out and bought a replacement gift for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: AK1995

customer_reviews.title: Great Jewelry Making Kit for Fans of LOL

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived open
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak the the quality of the item as I haven’t gifted/used it yet; however, it was opened at the corner when it arrived. I arranged for a replacement, which Was promptly sent, but when it arrived it was also opened in the same corned. I give up and will have to gift it anyway.

product_meta.title: L.O.L. Surprise! Secret Message Jewelry by Horizon Group USA, DIY Jewelry Making Craft Kit, Includes 400+ Beads & Charms, Sticker Sheets, Secret Decoder & More. Multicolored
product_meta.description: Style:Secret MessageShare secrets and express yourself with the L. O. L. Surprise! secret message jewelry kit! Explore five different jewelry designs and choose from over 400 beads and charms to create cool custom pieces. Mix and match letters and icons to create top secret messages that can only be decoded with the secret decoding key! Share special secret message jewelry with your BFF or designer pieces full of Secrets, never to be revealed. Special surprises charms inside. Recommended for jewelry lovers ages 5 and up.
feature_bullets: L. O. L. Secrets: share secret messages through jewelry by adding stickers to charms and using the included decoder.
explore your creativity: choose from over 400 beads and charms to create cool custom pieces.
jewelry tips & techniques: learn how to create double strand beaded bracelets, single strand beaded bracelets, braided slider charm bracelets, rotating charm necklaces and slider charm bracelets.
surprise inside: open up your set to reveal surprise charms.

kit includes: 295 beads, 42 alphabet charms, 2 rotating charms, 30 slider charms, 3 skeins of elastic cord, 3 skeins of satin cord, 3 bands, 1 sticker sheet, 2 epoxy sticker sheets, 1 decoder, and easy-to-follow instructions

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,074 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
